name: ROWBOTS
description:
R.O.W.B.O.T.S 

is a 2D Wave Survival Shooter with 2 PLAYER COOP!


IT HAS GONE ROGUE

You are sent to an hostile Space-Station with the mission to stop an AI-Super-Computer that has gone rogue! Shoot endless waves of enemies while progressing further into the Space-Station. Unravel the story and progress even further by interacting with the map or by solving puzzles!

SHOOT, BUY & COLLECT

Gather money by killing endless waves of Rowbots. Buy open barricades and get access to better guns & perks!

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIEND

Play the game with your best friend via the Online-Multiplayer! But beware, having a partner might not make it easier...

Right now Multiplayer is only possible via Direct IP. The Host has to open Port 51400 when Steam is running in the backround. And without Steam just choose whatever port you like.

THE VOICE

Unravel the story behind the game. You are sent to an hostile Space-Station to stop an AI that was created by a former crew member. The AI has gone rogue and is now using the Construction-Rowbots of the Space-Station to search & destroy all the remaining crew members. You have to stop it!

For some DEVLOGS, just visit our Youtube-Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpLiYKVcA1QklOcwDXAo-mg
